- Universal Rendering Pipeline

- 32 game-ready Vine Plants assets [*fbx / 1 texture atlas (*tga)]

----------------

Number of meshes - 32
Minimum polygon count - 40 tris
Maximum polygon count - 1250 tris

Meshes:

SM_Vine_Plant_Climber_A_02 - 186 tris

SM_Vine_Plant_Flower_Hanging_A_02 - 297 tris
SM_Vine_Plant_Flower_Hanging_A_03 - 362 tris

Textures:
T_Vine_Plant - 2048x2048 *tga

Number of textures - 4
- AO
- BaseColorOpacity
- MetallicSmoothness
- Normal

UV mapping: Yes
channel 1: overlapping
channel 2: non-overlapping (for baking lightmaps)
